keyFacts: The document is an email chain from August 26, 2019, concerning the Jeffrey Epstein criminal case (19 cr 490).
U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman mentions the possibility of 30 victims being involved in the case the following day.
The email forwards a letter from Judge Richard M. Berman dated August 12, 2019, regarding the same case.
The correspondence highlights ongoing legal and investigative activity in the Epstein case shortly after his death in August 2019.
